text: Eteke yadi allahe tomaka sihamtara kono dalara ocarata ghuraa'i ane arau sihamte abhiyanata olabalai tomara ocarata praarthana karae, tetiya tumi ka’ba, ‘tomaloke mora lagata ketiya'o olaba noraaraa arau tomaloke mora sangi hai ketiya'o satraura lagata yud'dha karaiba noraaraiba. Tomaloke prathame'i bahi thakatoke pachanda karaichila; seye tomaloke pichata raai yoraabilakara lagata bahi thaka’
